title: SCCL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 33 General Medical Consultant Posts
description: The Singareni Collieries Company (SCCL) has released an official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 33 General Medical Consultant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, BDS, and MDS can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the SCCL Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or bef...
